pkgmetadata.longdescription: Longitudinal Dataframes into Arrays for Machine Learning Training // An easy tool to transform 2D longitudinal data into 3D arrays suitable for Long short-term memory neural networks training. The array output can be used by the 'keras' package. Long short-term memory neural networks are described in: Hochreiter, S., Schmidhuber, J. (1997) doi:10.1162/neco.1997.9.8.1735.
